Text: M-My regeneration... It can't keep up...!
Why... Why?! Why can you...fight like this?!
Heh...!

Your sword is burdened with too much unnecessary
baggage.

Whatever those feelings of yours might be, they're
unnecessary in the pursuit of swordsmanship.
Unnecessary...?!

My sword...is my means...to obtain everything!
Everything!

The mere "10th rank" I was handed...will never
satisfy me!

Those old fools! I will use this power, this
sword...to take EVERYTHING...!!!

No matter how refined your swordplay, a technique
burdened with emotional excess can never surpass
mine.
I-Impossible...!
You're hardly using...any magic...!

The essence of parrying lies between blocking and
dodging.

I've fully grasped your sword technique. I no longer
even need a blade to deflect it.
Cutscene

...Such beautiful radiance...! Ohh...my pen cannot
do justice to this divine beauty...!
It's like a pillar piercing the heavens...!
Boss man's big fireworks! Sparkly and beautiful!

That light is a new melody brought into this world
by our lord...!

This radiance will change everything... Master
Shadow makes me believe that...

Master's power...reaches to ends of the sky...
Heheh...fascinating...!

It's overwhelming... I never imagined Master
Shadow's power was this immense...!
My hands...won't stop shaking...!
Shadow... The Shadow Garden...

Could it be...I understood nothing...nothing...all
this time...?
...Don't worry.

For us, the Shadow Garden...for those of us possessed
who fight against the Cult of Diablos....
That light is unquestionably a warm blessing...
...I'd rate it 74 out of 100.
(Not bad. It wasn't bad.)

(The mountaineer-slash-bandit set up by Alpha did a
great job playing the role of a foil.)

(Solid swordsmanship, tough armor, regenerative
abilities, and that transformation into a dragon
guy—way more diverse and interesting than the
usual run-of-the-mill thief characters.)

(But my own move... Even if it was something I was
testing out, I can't in good conscience give the
results a perfect pass.)

(Yup...the moment I launched that attack, I realized
once again...)

(Even if I could unleash enough power to repel a
nuclear attack, what if they came from 360 degrees
all around? What then?)

("Rising Atomic" has ample power, but the fact is it
can only counter one nuclear attack at a time.)

(...Maybe it's time to revisit the original
concept.)

I still have a long way to go to reach the peak of
my strength—
(And then...)

(There's the fact that the aftermath of "Rising
Atomic" was too strong, creating a massive
crater with me at the center.)

(Meaning, the white truffles that were likely buried
around here, along with the surrounding soil and
greenery...are all gone without a trace!)
Farewell...my 100 million Zeni...!
